thread.title: 2/8 scout sniper platoon begins pre-screener (Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, CA)
thread.title_full: 2/8 scout sniper platoon begins pre-screener (Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, CA) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: 2/8 scout sniper platoon begins pre-screener (Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton, CA)
text: ( Source : Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton , CA) MARINE CORPS BASE CAMP LEJEUNE, N.C. -- A new scout sniper platoon in 2nd Battalion, 8th Marine Regiment is being constructed and Marines are going through a pre-screener for the platoon Oct.
